card.card: {"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"少女歌剧动画版的音乐，本就建立在正统的管弦乐编配之上，而在2019年3月30日，它终于把原本的形态在现场呈现。\n2.5次元音乐剧可以轻松享受，而这次的交响音乐会也不必正襟危坐。在迎来短暂休暇的日子，希望少女歌剧starry konzert能为大家带来更多愉悦。\n视频地址：av67374039","id":35561399,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":410,"img_size":27.57,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/46141bb88adbfdc3efb9767e96b0fd0a487eb2c6.png","img_tags":null,"img_width":393},{"img_height":973,"img_size":162.55,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/2c62c0f3945188f8a314ade014e946d04448b72d.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1454}],"pictures_count":2,"reply":29,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1568205701},"user":{"head_url":"https:\/\/i1.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
